ygData.subject: RE: Effects of AGI
ygData.msgSnippet: ... didn t realize i had any attitude, i always try to help and not come off that way.  on the list and in the game as well.  i ve been told many times i am
ygData.messageBody:
> I'm only teasing you man. But you do have the level 50 attitude.
> Us lowbie high 30s and low 40s know a few things too, ya know?

didn't realize i had any attitude, i always try to help and not come off
that way. on the list and in the game as well. i've been told many times i
am the nicest and usually the only level 50 person that even talks to people
when they ask questions or such. the only thing i don't do is hand out to
beggars, i am sure i am not alone on that issue. if i come off like a level
50, well i am, and its a different perspective that i pass along to
everyone, but as far as attitude i try not to sound arrogant and if i do i'm
sorry.

> >yes harmonic you are the better bard i submit.
>
> I never claimed that, however I probably look a lot better ;-)
> btw, whats your charisma master bard <G> I have seen lots of
> good info and advice from you on the list. I apologize for
> offending you.

i'm sorry for getting mad. charisma is 94. i play a battle bard obviously
and no one has been able to prove (that i know of) that charisma has any
effect other than on prices.

no you can not possibly look better =P

Shada

> Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
